bài 1.Name: Bài toán số 1
bài 1.code: function gcd(a, b) { while (b) { let temp = b; b = a % b; a = temp; } return a; } function simplifyFraction(numerator, denominator) { const divisor = gcd(numerator, denominator); const simplifiedNumerator = numerator / divisor; const simplifiedDenominator = denominator / divisor; return `\\frac{${simplifiedNumerator}}{${simplifiedDenominator}}`; } function projectPointToPlane(a, b, c, A, B, C, D) { let distance1 = (A * a + B * b + C * c + D); let distance2 = (A * A + B * B + C * C); let x_tu = a * distance2 - A * distance1; let y_tu = b * distance2 - B * distance1; let z_tu = c * distance2 - C * distance1; let x = simplifyFraction(x_tu, distance2); let y = simplifyFraction(y_tu, distance2); let z = simplifyFraction(z_tu, distance2); return { x: x, y: y, z: z }; } let a = 1, b = 2, c = 0; let A = 2, B = -2, C = 2, D = -1; let projection = projectPointToPlane(a, b, c, A, B, C, D); return projection;

bài 1.Name: Bài toán số 1
bài 1.code: function gcd(a, b) { while (b) { let temp = b; b = a % b; a = temp; } return a; } function simplifyFraction(numerator, denominator) { const divisor = gcd(numerator, denominator); const simplifiedNumerator = numerator / divisor; const simplifiedDenominator = denominator / divisor; return `\\frac{${simplifiedNumerator}}{${simplifiedDenominator}}`; } function projectPointToPlane(a, b, c, A, B, C, D) { let distance1 = (A * a + B * b + C * c + D); let distance2 = (A * A + B * B + C * C); let x_tu = a * distance2 - A * distance1; let y_tu = b * distance2 - B * distance1; let z_tu = c * distance2 - C * distance1; let x = simplifyFraction(x_tu, distance2); let y = simplifyFraction(y_tu, distance2); let z = simplifyFraction(z_tu, distance2); return { x: x, y: y, z: z }; } function getRandomInt(min, max) { return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min; } function getRandomFromArray(arr) { return arr[Math.floor(Math.random() * arr.length)]; } let a = getRandomInt(-5, 5); let b = getRandomInt(-5, 5); let c = getRandomInt(-5, 5); let A = getRandomFromArray([-2, 1, 2]); let B = getRandomFromArray([-2, 1, 2]); let C = getRandomFromArray([-2, 1, 2]); let D = getRandomFromArray([-2, 1, 2]); let projection = projectPointToPlane(a, b, c, A, B, C, D); return projection;
